scripts.copy-static: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path out\_next\static; if (Test-Path src\public) { Copy-Item -Path src\public\* -Destination out\ -Recurse -Force }; if (Test-Path .next\static) { Copy-Item -Path .next\static\* -Destination out\_next\static\ -Recurse -Force }"
